section.p: A Coverage Activity groups the policy and authorization acts within a Payers Section to order the payment sources. A Coverage Activity contains one or more Policy Activities, each of which contains zero or more Authorization Activities. The Coverage Activity id is the ID from the patient's insurance card. The sequenceNumber/@value shows the policy order of preference.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-8897, CONF:1198-10492, CONF:1198-32596 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.60"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
SHALL conform to Coverage Activity template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.60)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-8876)/@code="48768-6" Payment Sources (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-19160, CONF:1198-32156)

contains [1..*] entryRelationship such that it
Conforms to Policy Activity2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.61:2015-08-01)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-8878)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:1198-8879)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] sequenceNumber (CONF:1198-17174)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] act, where its type is Policy Activity (V3) (CONF:1198-15528)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
SHALL conform to Coverage Activity template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.60)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8872, R2.1=CONF:1198-8872)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:8873, R2.1=CONF:1198-8873)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8874, R2.1=CONF:1198-8874)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-8876)/@code="48768-6" Payment Sources (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-19160, CONF:1198-32156)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:8875, R2.1=CONF:1198-8875, R2.1=CONF:1198-19094)

contains [1..*] entryRelationship such that it
Conforms to Policy Activity2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.61:2015-08-01)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-8878)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:1198-8879)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] sequenceNumber (CONF:1198-17174)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] act, where its type is Policy Activity (V3) (CONF:1198-15528)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] sequenceNumber/@value (CONF:8973) (CONF:8973)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire

body.codeblock: <act xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" classCode="ACT" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.60" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.60"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="915773433"/> <code code="48768-6" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Payment Sources"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <entryRelationship typeCode="COMP"> <act classCode="ACT" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.61" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.61"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1663246304"/> <code codeSystemName=""/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <performer> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.87"/> </performer> <performer typeCode="PRF"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.88"/> </performer> <participant> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.89"/> </participant> </act> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <act classCode="ACT" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.61" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.61"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1134891033"/> <code codeSystemName=""/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <performer> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.87"/> <assignedEntity/> </performer> <performer typeCode="PRF"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.88"/> <time> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </time> <assignedEntity/> </performer> <participant> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.89"/> <time> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </time> <participantRole/> </participant> </act> </entryRelationship> </act>

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:8897, CONF:10492 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.60"
Consol Coverage Activity MAY contain zero or one [0..1] sequenceNumber/@value (CONF:8973) (CONF:8973)
SHALL conform to CDA Act
Consol Coverage Activity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8872, R2.1=CONF:1198-8872)
Consol Coverage Activity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:8873, R2.1=CONF:1198-8873)
Consol Coverage Activity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8874, R2.1=CONF:1198-8874)
Consol Coverage Activity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="48768-6" Payment Sources (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:8876)
Consol Coverage Activity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:8875, R2.1=CONF:1198-8875, R2.1=CONF:1198-19094)

Consol Coverage Activity SHALL contain [1..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:8878, R2.1=CONF:1198-8878, CONF:8879, R2.1=CONF:1198-8879, CONF:15528, R2.1=CONF:1198-15528) Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP, and Conforms to Policy Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.61)
